title: Didn't get my rakan/xayah gifting Icon...
body: I gifted my friend 2 days after xayah and rakan were released but I never received my Icon. :/

replies.body: Looks like we did another round of icon gifting, and you should have that icon by now!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=tncx7vrm,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-11T23:00:28.878+0000)
>
> Looks like we did another round of icon gifting, and you should have that icon by now!

Thank you very much, I received it!
